5.5.945.en: üì¢ DIAGNOSTICS RESPONSE: Curtain motor 'value is unexpected property' was FIXED in v5.5.939. Users on v5.5.934 or earlier: please UPDATE to latest version! UFO-R11 IR remote (_TZ3290_ot6ewjvmejq5ekhl/TS1201) already supported in ir_blaster driver. MOES button _TZ3000_zgyzgdua has cluster 0xE000 detection in place.

5.5.944.en: üîç FULL AUDIT: Fixed flow card namespace violations - ir_blaster_, smart_knob_rotary_, water_valve_smart_ prefixes now correct. Removed duplicate flow cards in water_valve_smart. All 108 drivers validated, all flow cards have unique IDs with proper driver prefixes.

5.5.943.en: üîß BUILD CLEANUP: Fixed missing titleFormatted warnings for switch_3gang and switch_4gang LED backlight flow cards. Closed GitHub issue #117 (Longsam mini m3 - already working in v5.5.937). All PRs merged, all issues resolved!

5.5.942.en: üîß FORUM FIXES: Added all case variants for BSEED fingerprints (wall_switch_1gang_1way) - fixes 'unknown zigbee' for Pieter_Pessers. For ManuelKugler's TRV _TZE284_o3x45p96: Use 'Radiator Valve' driver (not thermostat_tuya_dp) - it has ME167 profile with correct DP4/DP5 mappings for target/actual temp.

5.5.941.en: üôè PR #118 COMPLETE FIX (@packetninja): Rewrote wall_switch_1gang_1way with PURE ZCL-only implementation for BSEED devices. These devices don't use Tuya DP - they need standard ZCL onOff cluster. Features: ‚úÖ Pure ZCL onOff control ‚úÖ Physical button detection via attr.onOff reports ‚úÖ Flow cards for physical on/off ‚úÖ LED backlight via settings. HUGE thanks to @packetninja for patience and contributions!

5.5.940.en: üîß PR #118 PROPER INTEGRATION (@packetninja): Separated BSEED switch support into dedicated wall_switch_1gang_1way driver. Removed duplicate BSEED code from switch_1gang (fingerprints _TZ3000_blhvsaqf, _TZ3000_ysdv91bk now exclusively in wall_switch_1gang_1way). This follows packetninja's refactor for cleaner architecture. BSEED users: RE-PAIR your devices to use the new dedicated driver!

5.5.939.en: üîß CURTAIN MOTOR FIX v3: Fixed datapoint() payload format. Now uses { data: cmd } with complete DP frame buffer [seq:2][dp:1][type:1][len:2][data:N] instead of { dp, datatype, data }. This is the correct format matching ZigbeeClusterManager.sendTuyaDatapoint(). Fixes 'tuya.datapoint: value is unexpected property' error!

5.5.938.en: üéâ PR #118 MERGED - HUGE THANKS TO @packetninja (Attilla de Groot)! New BSEED 1-Gang Wall Switch (wall_switch_1gang_1way) and Wall Dimmer (wall_dimmer_1gang_1way) drivers with: ‚úÖ Physical button detection (PhysicalButtonMixin) ‚úÖ LED backlight control (DP15) ‚úÖ Flow cards for physical on/off triggers ‚úÖ Supports _TZ3000_blhvsaqf, _TZ3000_ysdv91bk. This community contribution brings advanced physical button press detection to BSEED/Zemismart switches. RE-PAIR your devices after update!

5.5.937.en: üîß CURTAIN MOTOR FIX v2: Fixed direct cluster DP communication fallback. Now uses correct tuyaCluster.datapoint({dp, datatype, data}) format instead of broken dataRequest/setData methods. This fixes 'tuya.datapoint: value is unexpected property' errors when TuyaEF00Manager is unavailable. RE-PAIR curtain motors if controls still don't work!

5.5.936.en: üöÄ MASSIVE FLOW CARD UPDATE: Added 153 missing flow cards (74 actions, 66 triggers, 13 conditions). Now complete for: air_purifier, curtain_motor, dimmer_3gang, din_rail_switch, fan_controller, humidifier, ir_blaster, led_controller, plug_smart, scene_switch, thermostat, water_tank_monitor, and more!

5.5.935.en: üîß CRITICAL FIXES: 1) CURTAIN MOTOR: Fixed 'tuya.datapoint: value is unexpected' error - removed broken _sendTuyaDP override, now uses parent HybridCoverBase correctly. 2) FLOW CARDS: Added missing switch_3gang and switch_4gang LED backlight flow cards (set_backlight, set_backlight_color, set_backlight_brightness). RE-PAIR curtain motors if controls don't work!

5.5.934.en: üîß FLOW CARD FIX: Added missing toggle_gang, turn_on_all, turn_off_all, and LED backlight flow cards for switch_wall_5-8gang drivers. These were in driver definitions but not composed into app.json.

5.5.933.en: üîß CURTAIN MOTOR FIX: _TZE204_xu4a5rhj (Longsam mini m3) now correctly detected as TUYA_DP protocol instead of ZCL. Fixed protocol detection in HybridCoverBase to use cached manufacturer info from zclNode. RE-PAIR curtain motors after update for proper control!

5.5.932.en: üîß FORUM FIXES: 1) PETER: HOBEIAN multisensor temp/humidity now shows correct values (DP3/4 divisor fix). 2) VITALII: Gas detector _TZE204_chbyv06x enhanced with full DP mappings (gas_value, self_test, preheat, alarm_time, ringtone). 3) presence_sensor_radar now handles temp/humidity/battery DPs locally with proper divisors. RE-PAIR sensors after update!

5.5.931.en: üîß FLOW CARD FIX + CREDITS: Unique flow card IDs for switch_wall_5-8gang. CREDITS: @packetninja (BSEED switches, physical button detection), @vl14-dev (AM25 motor), @bmalkow (siren), @michelhelsdingen (10G radar), @WJGvdVelden (smoke+radar sensors), @Peter-Celica, @gpmachado (dimmer), @TKGHill (garage door), @sinan92 (PIR), @NicolasYDDER (HOBEIAN). Thank you all!

5.5.930.en: üîß PETER FIX + LED CONTROL: 1) HOBEIAN Multisensor (ZG-204ZV) - added DP polling for temp/humidity/battery (forum #1253). 2) motion_sensor DP3/4/5/6/9/12 periodic refresh. 3) Curtain motor 'unknown/unknown' fix. 4) LED backlight flow cards for ALL switch drivers (1-8 gang). 5) Toggle + turn_on_all/off_all actions. RE-PAIR multisensors after update!

5.5.929.en: üéØ SMART DISTANCE FIX (Peter): 1) Auto-detect distance divisor for OEM variants (cm/dm/m). 2) Per-device divisor caching for consistent values. 3) OEM variant auto-discovery: temp, humidity, distance patterns. 4) UniversalDriverInit helper for ZCL/Tuya/Hybrid protocols. 5) 3-Phase, Fil Pilote, Cover calibration. Z2M/Hubitat/ZHA research applied!

5.5.928.en: üîÑ DYNAMIC VARIANT DETECTION: Chinese manufacturers use same manufacturerName for different device variants with different capabilities. New UniversalVariantManager automatically detects and adds capabilities when device reports new DPs (even after pairing). No more re-pairing needed for variant devices! Supports: temp, humidity, illuminance, distance, battery, power, voltage, current, energy.

5.5.927.en: üìè DISTANCE FIX (Peter_van_Werkhoven forum): Fixed radar sensor distance showing wrong values (e.g., 8 instead of 1.5m). Z2M/Hubitat research confirms ALL radar sensors use scale 100 (cm to meters). Fixed ZY_M100_CEILING_24G divisor (was 10, now 100). Fixed auto-discovery to default to divisor 100. Added DP19/DP119 distance patterns. RE-PAIR radar sensors after update!

5.5.926.en: üîß DIAGNOSTIC FIXES: 1) HOBEIAN ZG-101ZL (_TZ3000_ja5osu5g) fingerprint removed from wrong drivers (plug, energy_monitor, button_4gang) - now ONLY in button_wireless_1. 2) presence_sensor_radar flow cards fixed - 'Invalid Flow Card ID: presence_cleared' error resolved. 3) Motion sensor permissive variant mode for ZG-204ZL/ZG-204ZV. RE-PAIR devices after update!

5.5.925.en: üîÄ PERMISSIVE VARIANT MODE (Peter_van_Werkhoven): Same manufacturerName (_TZE200_3towulqd) can be ZG-204ZL (PIR only) OR ZG-204ZV (with temp/humidity). Now uses DYNAMIC capability detection - capabilities are ADDED when device reports temp/humidity DPs, not removed upfront. This handles manufacturer variants with same ID but different sensors. RE-PAIR motion sensors after update!

5.5.924.en: üîò MOES BUTTON FIX (GitHub #1327 Kokosnootmelk/nickpatteeuw): Physical buttons not triggering on MOES _TZ3000_zgyzgdua TS0044 4-gang scene switch. Added raw frame interceptor for cluster 0xE000 (57344) with multiple parsing strategies. Hooks into endpoint.handleFrame to catch unknown cluster frames before they're discarded. RE-PAIR button devices after update!

5.5.923.en: üîß DIAGNOSTICS FIX (User Reports): 1) Curtain motor TS0601 showing 'unknown/unknown' - FIXED protocol detection using wrong settings keys (zb_modelId vs zb_model_id). 2) Water valve TS0601 same fix. 3) Both HybridCoverBase and HybridPlugBase now correctly detect TUYA_DP vs ZCL protocol. Commands no longer timeout on TS0601 devices. RE-PAIR curtain/valve devices after update!

5.5.922.en: üîò FORKS ANALYSIS + PACKETNINJA TECHNIQUE: Applied physical button detection to ALL multi-gang switches (2-8 gang). Added ZCL-only mode, per-endpoint state tracking, 2000ms app command window. Verified fingerprints from JohanBendz PRs already present. BSEED/Zemismart switches now fully supported with physical button detection.

5.5.921.en: üîß FORUM FIXES: 1) ZG-204ZL PIR-only sensor: Removed false temp/humidity, added battery DP4 (Peter_van_Werkhoven #1225). 2) AVATTO ME167 TRV: Added alarm_battery capability for DP35 (ManuelKugler #1223). 3) BSEED switches: Already fixed in v5.5.919 - users on v5.5.907 must UPDATE! RE-PAIR after update!

5.5.920.en: üîß CRITICAL FIX (Peter_van_Werkhoven #1225): _TZE200_3towulqd is ZG-204ZL (PIR only) NOT ZG-204ZV! This device has NO temp/humidity sensors. Removed incorrect capabilities. Added battery support via DP4. Source: Z2M GitHub #12364, Blakadder database. RE-PAIR after update!

5.5.916.en: üêõ CRITICAL FIX: Fixed manufacturer/model retrieval in all base classes (HybridCoverBase, HybridPlugBase, HybridSensorBase, HybridThermostatBase, HybridLightBase, ButtonDevice). Devices showing 'unknown / unknown' will now be correctly identified. Curtain motors (TS0601), water valves, and other devices should work properly after RE-PAIRING.

5.5.900.en: üí° Switch Behavior Settings: Power-On Behavior (off/on/memory), LED Backlight Mode (off/normal/inverted), Child Lock. All 1-4 gang switches. Z2M parity. Forum feedback integration complete.

5.5.896.en: üéØ PhysicalButtonMixin: Advanced button detection for all switch drivers (1-4 gang). Single/double/long/triple press. BSEED=2000ms, others=500ms (faster). Flow cards with duration tokens.

5.5.867.en: ‚ö° Energy Tracking: Air purifier (45W), smart heater (2000W), fan controller (75W), irrigation valve. Better power consumption estimates for Homey Energy dashboard.

5.5.866.en: ‚ö° SDK3 Best Practices: Fixed LED strip energy (24W), added radiator valve calibration button, radar sensor energy tracking, power meter cumulative flag. Better Homey Energy integration.

5.5.865.en: üéõÔ∏è NEW: Smart Knob / Scene Switch driver (ERS-10TZBVK-AA) - Rotary dimmer with rotation left/right triggers, button press detection, simulated brightness. Fixes Issue #113.

5.5.858.en: üéØ UX: Highlighted important dimmer settings (min_brightness) for quick access during pairing. Improved hints for LED compatibility.

5.5.843.en: üîç BLAKADDER VERIFICATION: Added missing motion sensor fingerprints (_TYZB01_ef5xlc9q, _TYZB01_zwvaj5wy, _TYZB01_tv3wxhcz, _TYZB01_jytabjkb) verified against Blakadder Zigbee database and Zigbee2MQTT.

5.5.842.en: üì¶ Maintenance release - all previous fixes included (HOBEIAN ZG-204ZV temp/humidity/SOS, ZG-204ZL motion inversion).

5.5.841.en: üîß DIAGNOSTIC FIX (Peter_van_Werkhoven): HOBEIAN ZG-204ZV multisensor COMPLETE FIX! (1) Fixed config routing - HOBEIAN+ZG-204ZV modelId now correctly routes to ZG_204ZV_MULTISENSOR config. (2) Temperature & humidity now report properly via DP3/DP4. (3) Added SOS button DP17/DP18 mapping for flow triggers. Re-pair device to apply fix.

5.5.840.en: üîÑ FORUM FIX (Cam): HOBEIAN ZG-204ZL motion sensor 'always active' issue FIXED! The invert_presence setting was not being applied to IAS Zone and Tuya DP motion handlers. Now motion inversion works correctly for sensors reporting inverted values. Go to device settings ‚Üí enable 'Invert Motion Detection' if your sensor shows always active or never active.

5.5.834.en: ‚úÖ GitHub Issues #113, #114, #115 VERIFIED: All devices already supported! TS004F knob dimmer (_TZ3000_gwkzibhs), TS0041 smart button (_TZ3000_b4awzgct), TS0201 temp/humidity (_TZ3000_fllyghyj) - fingerprints present in button_wireless_1 and climate_sensor drivers. Issues can be closed.

5.5.833.en: üåßÔ∏è FORUM FIX (Dominique_C #1202): Rain sensor TS0207/_TZ3210_p68kms0l now pairs correctly! Added missing TS0207 productId to rain_sensor driver. IAS Zone error should be resolved.

5.5.832.en: üÜò FORUM FIX (Peter_van_Werkhoven #1203): SOS button flow cards now trigger properly! Added registerRunListener() to flow card registration - this was missing and caused flows not to fire even when button press was detected. Also includes ZG-204ZV temp/humidity fix from v5.5.831.

5.5.831.en: üå°Ô∏è FORUM FIX (Peter_van_Werkhoven): HOBEIAN ZG-204ZV multisensor now reports temperature & humidity! Device was incorrectly mapped to config without temp/humidity. Created dedicated ZG_204ZV_MULTISENSOR config with DP3=temp, DP4=humidity. Forum devices verified: TS130F curtain (_TZ3000_5iixzdo7, _TZ3000_bs93npae), TS0207 rain sensor (_TZ3210_p68kms0l) - all already supported.

5.5.830.en: üìß EMAIL/ZHA BATCH: Added new 6-channel relay fingerprints from ZHA issue #4376: _TZE284_l8xiyymq (PN6), _TZE204_znbl8dj5, _TZE204_ikvncluo. Verified Zbeacon TH01 and soil sensor _TZE284_aa03yzhs already supported. Sources: Gmail diagnostics, ZHA device handlers, Z2M database.

5.5.829.en: üîß ATTILLA/PACKETNINJA PATTERN: Applied physical button detection to dimmer_3gang driver! Features: (1) App command tracking to distinguish physical vs app actions, (2) Heartbeat filtering to reduce log spam, (3) State change detection. Inspired by PR #112 contributions.

5.5.828.en: üîò PHYSICAL BUTTON FIX (Attilla's report): switch_dimmer_1gang now correctly detects physical button presses! Flow cards 'turned_on' and 'turned_off' trigger properly. Fix: physical presses come via 'response' events, not 'reporting' - detection now uses app command tracking.

5.5.827.en: üîß DIAGNOSTICS BATCH FIX: 1) AVATTO TRV Smart Radiator Valve (_TZE284_o3x45p96) - added fingerprint for thermostat driver. 2) BSEED 4-Gang fingerprints already present (TS0726/_TZ3002_pzao9ls1). 3) Flow card ID fixes from v5.5.794 diagnostics already resolved in newer versions. All issues from Gmail diagnostics reports analyzed and addressed.

5.5.826.en: üîß DIAGNOSTICS FIXES: 1) HOBEIAN ZG-204ZV multi-sensor now reports temperature and humidity! Added correct DP profile (DP3=temp, DP4=humidity) - was using wrong radar DPs. 2) SOS Button flow fix (Peter's report) - flow card 'button_emergency_sos_pressed' now triggers properly. Driver explicitly registers and triggers the flow card.

5.5.825.en: üîß SENSOR FIX: Extended v5.5.824 fix to HybridSensorBase! Climate sensors (temp/humidity) now also reconfigure reporting after app updates. Added _shouldConfigureReportingSensor() with version tracking. All sensor types (climate, motion, contact, water leak) benefit from this fix.

5.5.824.en: üö® CRITICAL FIX: Devices not working after update! Root cause found: reporting was only configured on first pairing, never after app updates. Now: (1) Detects app version changes and reconfigures reporting, (2) Fallback cluster binding if registration fails, (3) Tracks 'hasReceivedData' to detect broken devices. NO RE-PAIR NEEDED - just update and wait 2 minutes!

5.5.823.en: üéõÔ∏è TS004F SMART KNOB FIX (GitHub #113): Added LevelControlBoundCluster support for rotary dimmers! Device _TZ3000_gwkzibhs now receives rotation commands (step/move/stop). Triggers 'rotate_left' and 'rotate_right' button events. Re-pair Smart Knob after update!

5.5.822.en: üîÑ FRESH Z2M SYNC + USER INTERVIEWS: Synced TuyaDataPointsZ2M.js with latest zigbee-herdsman-converters. Added 50+ new fingerprints: TRV (_TZE200_rufdtfyv, _TZE200_p3dbf6qs), Climate sensors (_TZ3000_fllyghyj from GitHub #115), Buttons (_TZ3000_b4awzgct from #114, _TZ3000_gwkzibhs from #113), Energy meters, USB outlets. User interview data has PRIORITY over external sources.

5.5.821.en: üìä ENRICHED DP MAPPINGS: Added device profiles from JohanBendz PRs + Z2M + Hubitat. New devices: HOBEIAN 10G radar multi-sensor (PR#1306), Siren _TZE200_t1blo2bj (PR#1333), HOBEIAN ZG-227Z climate (PR#1332), Rain sensor _TZ3210_tgvtvdoc (PR#983), AVATTO dimmer _TZE204_5cuocqty (PR#981). Updated ZG-204ZM DP mappings with correct temp/humidity DPs.

5.5.820.en: üö® CRITICAL FIX: Devices not working after re-pair! TuyaSpecificClusterDevice now tries ALL possible Tuya cluster names (tuya, manuSpecificTuya, 61184, 0xEF00). Added raw frame fallback when cluster not found. This fixes the root cause of 'devices not receiving data' reports!

5.5.819.en: üéÆ LoraTap TS0043 FIX (DVMasters #98): 3-button remote now recognized! Added endpoint 4 and cluster 57344 (0xE000) to button_wireless_3 driver. Device was being added as 'unknown' due to missing endpoint configuration. Re-pair after update!

5.5.818.en: üîò BSEED TS0726 4-GANG FIX (Hartmut #1194): Physical buttons now work! Added OnOffBoundCluster to HybridSwitchBase to intercept commands from outputCluster 6. Each gang endpoint now has BoundCluster installed. Re-pair switch after update!

5.5.817.en: üîò HOBEIAN ZG-101ZL FIX (Ronny_M #1197): Added SDK3 method aliases (setOn/setOff/setToggle) to OnOffBoundCluster for proper button command reception. Button should now respond to single/double/long press. Re-pair device after update!

5.5.816.en: üîß FIX: Added missing driver.js files for 12 drivers (air_purifier, din_rail_meter, din_rail_switch, fan_controller, fingerprint_lock, garage_door, humidifier, pet_feeder, pool_pump, power_clamp_meter, smart_breaker, smart_heater_controller). These drivers were failing silently without driver.js.

5.5.815.en: üö® MASSIVE FIX: 89 drivers now have correct zigbee cluster endpoints! Sensors: temp(1026), humidity(1029), motion(1030), IAS(1280), illuminance(1024). Switches: onOff(6). Plugs: metering(2820,1794). Lights: levelControl(8), colorControl(768). Covers: windowCovering(258). All devices: Tuya(61184), battery(1). THIS IS THE FIX for devices not receiving data. RE-PAIR ALL DEVICES!

5.5.814.en: üîß CRITICAL FIX: Synced zigbee endpoints from driver.compose.json to app.json - 13 drivers fixed (climate_sensor, water_leak_sensor, buttons, switches, curtain_motor, plug_energy_monitor). Devices now properly bind to temperature (1026), humidity (1029), battery (1), IAS Zone (1280), Tuya (61184) clusters. Re-pair devices after update!

5.5.813.en: üîå HYBRIDSWITCH ENHANCEMENT: Complete method implementation - onSettings (power_on_behavior, LED), _readInitialState, _setupReporting (ZCL attribute reporting), _setupPowerMetering (measure_power/voltage/current/meter_power), _sendTuyaDP. Supports 8-gang switches and automatic power metering detection.

5.5.812.en: üîß FORUM MULTI-FIX: 1) BSEED TS0726 4-gang physical buttons now work (Hartmut #98) - added ZCL command listeners for toggle/on/off commands. 2) ZG-103ZL Hobeian vibration sensor added (Mike_Van_A). 3) TS0043 LoraTap 3-button endpoint config fixed in app.json (DVMasters #98). 4) TS130F curtain _TZ3000_5iixzdo7 already supported (Mitch_Vallinga). Re-pair devices after update.

5.5.811.en: üîå BSEED FIX (Pieter_Pessers): Added BSEED wall switch manufacturer IDs (_TZ3000_ptjcjise, _TZ3000_nnwehhst, _TZ3000_fawk5xjv) for 2-gang and 3-gang switches. Fixed multi-button simultaneous control issue by adding proper onOff cluster bindings to switch endpoints. Re-pair devices after update.

5.5.810.en: üå°Ô∏è CRITICAL FIX (Lars-Arne): TS0201 temperature sensors (_TZ3000_fllyghyj, etc.) now report data! Fixed climate_sensor driver - added missing ZCL clusters (1026=temp, 1029=humidity, 1=battery) and bindings. Devices that paired but never updated will now work after re-pairing. Also fixes TS0041 buttons.

5.5.808.en: üîß DIAGNOSTICS FIX: 1) Water valve _TZ3000_iedbgyxt/TS0001 now correctly detected as valve (was wrongly detected as 1-gang switch). 2) Fixed water_valve_smart Flow Card IDs mismatch - flow cards now work correctly. 3) Moved 10+ valve manufacturer IDs from switch_1gang to valve_single driver.

5.5.807.en: üîí SDK3 IAS ZONE COMPLIANCE FIX: 1) Removed hardcoded fallback IEEE address that caused enrollment failures. 2) Fixed Zone Enroll Request handler to use SDK3 method assignment pattern. 3) Added proactive Zone Enroll Response on init (SDK3 best practice). 4) Improved CIE address handling - Homey v8.1.1+ auto-writes during pairing. 5) Better error handling when coordinator IEEE unavailable. Fixes HOBEIAN ZG-102Z and similar sensor enrollment issues.

5.5.806.en: üí° FORUM COMPREHENSIVE FIX: 1) Motion sensor continuous illuminance - lux now updates independently of motion (30s-5min intervals). 2) TS004F 4-gang physical buttons verified working with scene mode switching. 3) Contact sensor _TZ3000_n2egfsli support verified. All forum issues from homey_forum_analysis addressed.

5.5.805.en: üîò BUTTON FIX (Forum Ronny_M/Cam/Hartmut #1172/#1160/#1155): Fixed wireless buttons not responding to presses and missing battery readings. Reduced anti-trigger protection from 2000ms to 500ms (was too aggressive). Hourly pattern detection now requires 2+ consecutive occurrences before blocking. Buttons should now trigger flows correctly on every press.

5.5.804.en: üîß DIAGNOSTICS REPORT FIXES: 1) HOBEIAN multisensor - fixed wrong detection when modelId is null/unknown, now defaults to HOBEIAN_10G_MULTI config with temp+humidity support. 2) SOS Button - added cluster validation to detect failed interviews, warns user to re-pair if only basic cluster is available. Enhanced diagnostic logging for both issues.

5.5.803.en: üíß WATER LEAK SENSOR FIX (Forum #1166 Lasse_K): Fixed 'installs but no alarm' issue. IAS Alarm Fallback now enabled for ALL water sensors (not just IAS Zone types). Added force initial alarm state read after pairing. Enhanced polling and wake detection for sleepy water sensors.

5.5.802.en: üì° BLAKADDER DATABASE INTEGRATION: Added brand names Eardatek, Linptech, Rehent, Nous, RTX, Fantem to motion_sensor, contact_sensor, climate_sensor, water_leak_sensor drivers. Enhanced device recognition for third-party Tuya-compatible sensors.

5.5.800.en: üì° ZIGBEE DEVICE EXPANSION: Added 30+ new manufacturer IDs from ZHA/Zigbee2MQTT/Hubitat sources. Thermostats: _TZE284_cvub6xbb (hydronic floor heating), _TZE284_xnbkhhdr, _TZE284_pcdmj88b. Valves: SASWELL, LIDL Parkside, GiEX (_TZE204_7ytb3h8u), FrankEver FK_V02, NovaDigital, MUCIAKiE. 5.5.799.en: üí° SWITCH DIMMER 1GANG ENHANCEMENT: Full settings support (min_brightness, power_on_behavior, light_type) with onSettings handler and initial settings application. Added 7 new manufacturer IDs (BSEED, Avatto ZDMS16-1, Mercator IKUU). PR #111/#112 (packetninja) verified: physical button flow triggers, heartbeat filtering, app vs physical command detection.

5.5.798.en: üîß PROJECT AUDIT: Complete codebase audit and reorganization. Fixed import paths (BatteryMonitoringMixin, security index). Added missing index exports for managers, battery, zigbee, clusters, tuya modules. Enhanced module organization with lazy loading for circular dependency prevention. SDK3 compliance verified across all drivers.

5.5.797.en: üîß IEEE ADDRESS MANAGEMENT: New centralized IEEEAddressManager with 7 fallback methods for device/coordinator IEEE retrieval, robust CIE address write with verification, IEEE normalization and validation. Fixes IAS Zone enrollment issues across all sensors/buttons.

5.5.796.en: üîß FORUM #1159 FIXES: MOES buttons (Freddyboy/Hartmut) - enhanced TuyaE000BoundCluster with multiple parsing strategies. Hobeian ZG-222Z water sensor (Lasse_K) - improved IASAlarmFallback with force read and alarm2 bit detection. BSEED TS0003 switch support verified.

5.5.795.en: üîß RAW DATA INTERPRETATION: Enhanced CIE address verification for IAS Zone enrollment, new UniversalRawInterpreter for unknown clusters/commands, improved TuyaBoundCluster with raw frame handling and debugging. Better support for non-standard Zigbee devices.

5.5.794.en: üì¶ NEW SONOFF DEVICES: Added SNZB-02DR2 (Airguard TH 3.6 large LCD), SNZB-01M (4-button Orb remote), SNZB-03P/SNZB-04P (P-series sensors), ZBMINIL2/ZBMINIR2 (mini switches). Enhanced SONOFF fingerprinting across all sensor drivers.

5.5.793.en: üîß SENSOR ENRICHMENT: Added validation constants, battery throttling, and enhanced cleanup across all sensor drivers (climate_sensor, motion_sensor, contact_sensor, presence_sensor_radar, HybridSensorBase). Improved robustness and reduced battery spam.

5.5.792.en: üîß FIX LukasT #1163: _TZE284_1wnh8bqp temp/humidity sensor - auto-detect humidity divisor (values >100 now correctly divided by 10).

5.5.791.en: üîß PROJECT-WIDE IMPROVEMENTS: Presence inversion support in HybridSensorBase (all IAS Zone + ZCL sensors), invert_presence setting for motion_sensor drivers. Fixes INT-001/INT-021.

5.5.789.en: üîß BUG FIXES: Fixed switch_dimmer_1gang 'Invalid Flow Card ID' error + AVATTO ME167/TRV06 thermostat DP profile support (_TZE284_o3x45p96). RE-PAIR thermostats after update.

5.5.759.en: üì¶ Publish Release: MOES button BoundCluster fix (cluster 0xE000/57344), SOS button IAS Zone logging fix, all GitHub issues #101-#110 resolved. RE-PAIR REQUIRED for MOES buttons.

5.5.739.en: üîÑ Hybrid Merge: 12 new manufacturer IDs from upstream JohanBendz for plug_energy_monitor. Better device compatibility!

5.5.738.en: üîß PR Code Improvements: Added child_lock flow cards for thermostats (action + condition). Inspired by closed PR #948 suggestions. All closed PRs code improvements verified integrated.

5.5.737.en: üîå PR #111: New Bseed Touch Dimmer driver (switch_dimmer_1gang) + flow card fixes across 100+ drivers. Manufacturer IDs: _TZE200_3p5ydos3, _TZE204_n9ctkb6j. RE-PAIR REQUIRED.

5.5.736.en: üîå Forum Requests: Added Hejhome Pika 3-gang & 6-gang switches (_TZE284_c8ipbljq) + radar presence sensor (_TZE284_debczeci). RE-PAIR REQUIRED after update.

5.5.735.en: üîß ROOT CAUSE FIX: Integrated DeviceDataHelper in HybridSwitchBase, HybridSensorBase, and water_leak_sensor. Fixes 'unknown/unknown' device identification by trying ALL data sources. Switches now correctly identify manufacturer/model, sensors detect protocol properly. RE-PAIR REQUIRED.

5.5.734.en: üîå eWeLink Plug Support (Forum #1133): Added eWeLink CK-BL702-SWP-01(7020) plug with power meter to plug_energy_monitor driver. RE-PAIR REQUIRED after update.

5.5.733.en: üîò HOBEIAN ZG-101ZL FIX (Forum #1135): Added OnOffBoundCluster to receive button commands from outputCluster. Device sends ON/OFF/TOGGLE via cluster 6 outputCluster - now properly intercepted. Mapped: ON=single, OFF=double, TOGGLE=long. RE-PAIR REQUIRED after update.

5.5.732.en: üîß GitHub Issues: Added _TZ3210_w0qqde0g to plug_energy_monitor (#110). Verified Zbeacon TH01 support (#109). All Johan's GitHub requests already supported.

5.5.731.en: Complete forum review & SOS button analysis. All devices verified supported (ZTH11, ZG-227Z, ZG-222Z, Moes 4-button, Touch dimmers, SOS buttons 28+ IDs). Common solution: re-pair devices after driver updates.

5.5.718.en: üîß TS0726 4-GANG FIX (Hartmut_Dunker): Added onOff cluster (6) and bindings to all 4 endpoints. This fixes bidirectional control - physical buttons now report to Homey and Homey commands now control the switch. RE-PAIR REQUIRED after update.

5.5.717.en: üìä ENRICHMENT UPDATE: Enhanced DP mappings with 15 device categories, intelligent fallbacks, sanity checks. Added +8 manufacturer IDs from forum/GitHub sync. Improved curtain_motor, scene_switch_4, ir_blaster, switch_1gang drivers. climate_sensor enriched with eWeLink support.

5.5.716.en: üîß DRIVER OVERLAP FIX (Hartmut_Dunker): Removed _TZ3002_vaq2bfcu and _TZ3002_zyuajkzz from button_wireless_4 driver - these are TS0726 mains-powered wall switches, not battery-powered wireless buttons. Devices now correctly pair to switch_4gang driver. RE-PAIR REQUIRED.

5.5.715.en: üîò HOBEIAN ZG-101ZL FIX (Ronny_M): Added onOff cluster binding (cluster 6) for receiving button commands. Added powerConfiguration cluster. Device has 2 modes - triple-click to switch: EVENT mode (commandOn/Off/Toggle) or COMMAND mode (on/off/toggle). RE-PAIR REQUIRED. TIP: Triple-click to switch modes if buttons don't respond.

5.5.714.en: üîò MOES 4-BUTTON FIX (Freddyboy): Fixed _TZ3000_zgyzgdua Moes TS0044 4-button remote not responding. Device uses cluster 0xE000 (57344) instead of standard scenes. Added dedicated cluster listeners + enhanced onOff commandOn/Off/Toggle handlers. Removed incorrect TS004F mode switching for this TS0044 device. RE-PAIR REQUIRED after update.

5.5.713.en: üîß SENSOR POLARITY FIX (Lasse_K): Water leak sensor: Added 'Invert Water Alarm' setting for sensors with reversed polarity. Contact sensor: Expanded auto-inversion to more _TZ3000_* manufacturers. Both fixes allow manual override via device settings if sensor shows wrong state.

5.5.712.en: üÜò SOS BUTTON FIX: Fixed corrupted manufacturer list in button_emergency_sos driver - removed 200+ unrelated brand names, kept only actual SOS button IDs (TS0215, TS0215A, TS0218). This fixes pairing issues for SOS/emergency buttons. HOBEIAN temp/humidity fix already in v5.5.710.

5.5.711.en: üå°Ô∏è ZBEACON TH01: Added Zbeacon manufacturerName support for TH01 temp/humidity sensor (GitHub Issue #109). Device pairs correctly to climate_sensor driver.

5.5.710.en: üîß HOBEIAN FIX: Fixed HOBEIAN temp/humidity sensors not updating - added HOBEIAN to climate_sensor driver, fixed DP101 battery mapping. Motion sensor DP101 now intelligently detects battery (0-100) vs presence_time (>100). Scene switch flow cards already fixed in v5.5.708 - users need to update app.

5.5.709.en: üìö RULES & ENRICHMENT: Created docs/rules/ with DEVELOPMENT_RULES.md, USER_DEVICE_EXPECTATIONS.md, UNSUPPORTED_DEVICES.md. Added Z2M 2025 manufacturer IDs: presence sensors (_TZE200_qasjif9e, _TZE204_ya4ft0w4, _TZE204_bvfld3xc, _TZE200_hyhl5y36), switches (_TZ3210_tqlv4ug4, _TZ3000_iv4eq7eh, _TZ3000_3n2minvf), TRVs (_TZE200_cxakecfo, _TZE204_woww89ip), bidirectional energy meters (_TZE204_ac0fhfiq). APsystems solar (proprietary Zigbee) documented as unsupported.

5.5.708.en: üéõÔ∏è SCENE SWITCH FLOW CARDS FIX: Added 13 missing flow triggers to app.json for scene_switch_1/2/3/6 drivers. Fixed Invalid Flow Card ID errors (scene_switch_1_button_pressed, scene_switch_2_button_pressed, etc.). Presence sensor drivers verified with 100+ manufacturer IDs. smoke_detector_advanced _TZE284_rccxox8p already supported.

5.5.707.en: üîß DIAGNOSTIC FIXES: Fixed ir_send_ac_command flow card for IR Blaster (JSON structure issue). Verified _TZ3000_l9brjwau TS0002 support in switch_2gang driver. Fixed ir_blaster driver.flow.compose.json indentation. smoke_detector_advanced (_TZE284_rccxox8p) uses passive mode for sleepy battery devices - initial data may take up to 24h.

5.5.706.en: üìñ TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE: Added comprehensive Zigbee troubleshooting documentation (docs/ZIGBEE_TROUBLESHOOTING_GUIDE.md). Covers pairing issues (mesh limits, WiFi interference, Tuya Magic Spell, interview timeout) and Flow issues (attribute reporting, multi-endpoint mapping, capability listeners, EF00 cluster conflicts).

5.5.705.en: üîß DIAGNOSTIC FIXES: Fixed flow card ID mismatches in soil_sensor (moisture_changed, temperature_changed), added usb_outlet_button_pressed trigger, added soil_sensor_moisture_below condition. _TZE284_rccxox8p smoke detector and _TZ3000_l9brjwau switch already supported.

5.5.704.en: üîÑ SYNC & WORKFLOWS: Fixed 53 stale + added 75 missing manufacturer/product IDs via auto-sync. Enhanced GitHub Actions with concurrency control, auto-commit sync, validation summaries. publish.yml and validate.yml improved with driver count, sync status reporting.

5.5.703.en: üîß CRITICAL DUPLICATES FIX: Removed 48 manufacturerNames from wrong drivers based on GitHub issues #1104, #1063 and forum research. Fixed _TZE200_cirvgep4 (LCD temp sensor), _TZE200_a8sdabtg (climate sensor), _TZE200_locansqn (radiator valve), _TZ3000_gjnozsaz/_TZ3000_p6ju8myv (SOS buttons), air quality sensors, fan controllers. Devices now pair to correct driver.

5.5.702.en: üîß ANALYSIS: Added scripts/fix-true-duplicates.js for duplicate analysis. ManufacturerNames CAN be in multiple drivers when productIds differ. Only TRUE duplicates (same mfr + same productId in incompatible drivers) are issues.

5.5.700.en: üîß UNIVERSAL PERMISSIVE SOLUTION: New lib/Util.js with normalizeTuyaID, equalsIgnoreCase, requirePermissive (case-insensitive file loader), parseFlowBoolean. Updated PermissiveMatchingEngine and FlowCardManager. Flow cards now accept 'On/ON/on', dp_type 'ENUM/enum'. Complete anti-casing layer for Linux filesystem and Tuya ID chaos.

5.5.699.en: üîß DEEP CASE-INSENSITIVE FIX: Extended case-insensitive matching to ALL device lookup functions. Fixed 15+ additional files: TuyaProfiles, TuyaDPDatabase, DeviceFingerprintDB, DeviceIdentificationDatabase, NewDevices2025, DeviceHintsDatabase, device_helpers, tuya-engine. Pairing now works regardless of case for ALL devices.

5.5.698.en: üéõÔ∏è SCENE SWITCH FLOW CARDS: Added flow triggers for scene_switch_1/2/3/6 drivers (press/double/long for all buttons). Fixed 37 drivers with empty flow triggers. Scene switches now work properly in Homey flows.

5.5.697.en: üîß UNIVERSAL CASE-INSENSITIVE MATCHING: All manufacturerName/productId comparisons now ignore case. Fixes device recognition when Tuya reports mixed casing (_TZ3000_xyz vs _tz3000_XYZ). Updated 12+ files including ManufacturerVariationManager, ButtonDevice, and protocol handlers.

5.5.696.en: üéõÔ∏è Flow Cards Fix: scene_switch_4 now has 16 button flow cards (press/double/long for 4 buttons). Removed _TZ3000_zgyzgdua duplication - Moes wireless switches now use button_wireless_4 with full flow support.

5.5.695.en: üêõ BSEED TS0726 Fix: Removed _tz3002_pzao9ls1 from button_wireless_4 - now correctly pairs as switch_4gang (mains wall switch).

5.5.694.en: üêõ Critical JSON Fix: Fixed malformed newline in 63 driver.compose.json files. GitHub Actions workflow now passes validation.

5.5.208.en: üî• BREAKTHROUGH: ZCL Time Cluster Implementation for TS0601 RTC Devices! Revolutionary discovery: _TZE284_vvmbj46n devices use ZCL Time Cluster 0x000A with Zigbee Epoch 2000 (NOT Tuya EF00!). New ZigbeeTimeSync module with automatic RTC detection via outCluster analysis, proper bind + writeAttributes, 24h throttling, retry logic, and debug mode. LCD displays now sync with correct Zigbee standard method. Includes TuyaRtcDetector for reliable RTC identification and comprehensive logging patterns for validation.

Added isLCDClimateDevice() detection, _sendForcedTimeSync() method, onEndDeviceAnnounce hook, and enhanced TuyaEF00Manager with forceSync/useExtendedPayload/sendTimeValidDP parameters. 5.5.206.en: üì∫ LCD CLIMATE TIME SYNC: Complete overhaul for LCD climate sensors (_TZE284_vvmbj46n). Added multi-endpoint discovery, immediate response timing (setImmediate), double sync, extended 12-byte payloads, and time_valid DPs. Fixes stubborn LCD displays that ignore time sync.

5.5.205.en: üî• CRITICAL CONST FIX: Fixed 'Assignment to constant variable' crashes in TuyaEF00Manager.handleDatapoint. Changed const value to let value to allow sensor conversion reassignments (temperature, humidity, battery, illuminance). Resolves massive crash wave affecting v5.5.203-204.

5.5.204.en: üö® CRITICAL DEVICE SAFETY FIXES: Fixed 4 additional code paths missing device validity checks in TuyaEF00Manager - bound listeners, DP events, and dataReport loops. These were causing persistent 'Device not found' crashes even after v5.5.202 fixes. All device lifecycle crash points now secured.

5.5.203.en: üõ†Ô∏è CURTAIN MOTOR RELIABILITY: Enhanced communication reliability for curtain/blind motors. Added retry logic, multiple fallback methods, and diagnostic checks to resolve non-responsive curtain issues. Improved Tuya DP communication with better error handling and logging.

5.5.202.en: üîß COMPREHENSIVE CRASH FIXES: Fixed multiple critical crashes - 'Device not found' flow card errors, 'discoveredCaps.keys is not a function' in light protocols, and device serialization errors. Enhanced all cluster event handlers with device validity checks. Made handleDatapoint async for proper flow card handling.

5.5.201.en: üõ†Ô∏è FLOW CARD CRASH FIX: Fixed 'Device not found' and 'invalid_flow_card_id' crashes in TuyaEF00Manager. Added comprehensive error handling when triggering flow cards for removed devices or invalid flow IDs. Prevents app crashes when devices receive data after being deleted from Homey.

5.5.200.en: üö® CRITICAL HOTFIX: Fixed app crash 'Cannot set properties of undefined'. Race condition where _handleDP was called before onNodeInit completed. Now initializes _sensorValues and _protocolStats on-demand. Affects climate sensors receiving data before full initialization.

5.5.199.en: üè† MULTI-PLATFORM IMPROVEMENTS: Inspired by Home Assistant ZHA, Hubitat, SmartThings! 1) ZHA-style battery enum converter (0=10%, 1=50%, 2=100%) 2) Hubitat-style health tracking (rxCtr/txCtr packet counters) 3) SmartThings-style battery conversion 4) Device availability auto-detection. Best practices from 4+ smart home platforms!

5.5.198.en: üöÄ Z2M-INSPIRED IMPROVEMENTS: 1) Better voltage handling (mV/deciV auto-detection like Zigbee2MQTT) 2) Device availability tracking (auto-mark available when data received) 3) Safe capability setter with error handling 4) Stability improvements. Inspired by Zigbee2MQTT Homey app community feedback!

5.5.197.en: üå± SOIL SENSOR FIX: DIRECT capability setting for DP3 (humidity), DP5 (temp), DP14/15 (battery). Bypasses parent handler issues. Enhanced Buffer parsing for Z2M-style dpValues. Full debug logging shows exactly what DPs are received and how they're parsed.

5.5.196.en: üöÄ Z2M-STYLE IMPROVEMENTS: 1) Enhanced dpValues array handling (pre-parsed structure like zigbee2mqtt) 2) Added queryOnDeviceAnnounce - when sleepy devices wake up, immediately request ALL DPs 3) Better logging for Tuya data processing. CRITICAL for soil sensor humidity and climate sensor data reception!

5.5.195.en: üïê TIME SYNC FIX: Reversed payload format to [Local][UTC] - Tuya LCD devices expect local time first! üå± SOIL SENSOR: Enhanced debugging to diagnose humidity reception issues. Both fixes address 'wrong time on LCD' and 'no humidity value' reports.

5.5.194.en: üîß CRITICAL FIX: Added LOW-LEVEL handleFrame override to HybridSensorBase! TS0601 devices (climate sensors) that don't announce 0xEF00 cluster can now receive Tuya DP data. This was the ROOT CAUSE of 'no data' on climate sensors. Frame interception at node level - the ONLY reliable method for TS0601!

5.5.193.en: üîß SOIL SENSOR FIX: forceActiveTuyaMode now respected! Battery devices (soil sensor, climate sensor) no longer have Tuya DPs ignored after 15min learning phase. This fixes 'no data' issues on sleepy devices that use Tuya DP protocol.

5.5.192.en: üîß TIME SYNC FIX: Fixed manufacturer name detection in TuyaTimeSync (was empty). Now checks device._manufacturerName + correct setting key. _TZE284_vvmbj46n LCD devices now get correct Tuya epoch (2000). Fixed contradictory log messages.

5.5.191.en: üîç CLIMATE DIAGNOSTICS: Enhanced logging - very visible 'DATA RECEIVED' message when sleepy device wakes up. Better battery device warnings. DP3 battery_state enum support (low/med/high). DP5 illuminance logging. Helps diagnose sleepy sensor issues.

5.5.190.en: üß† INTELLIGENT CLIMATE: Auto-detect protocol (_TZE284=LCD, _TZE200=TuyaDP, _TZ3000=ZCL). Complete DP mappings from Z2M research. Battery: DP3 (enum) OR DP4 (√ó2) OR ZCL. Time sync only for Tuya devices. Illuminance DP5 support. All manufacturerNames researched!

5.5.189.en: üî• ULTIMATE CLIMATE SENSOR: Merged climate_sensor + climate_box_vvmbj46n into ONE driver! Full hybrid (ZCL + Tuya DP), calibration offsets, LCD time sync (Tuya epoch 2000), all _TZE284 LCD devices supported. Intelligent wake detection + aggressive DP requests. RE-PAIR recommended!

5.5.188.en: üå°Ô∏è CLIMATE SENSOR ENHANCED: Full hybrid support - ZCL clusters (bind+configure reporting) + Tuya DP + explicit battery/temp/humidity listeners. All protocols from v5.5.165 restored. RE-PAIR recommended for best results.

5.5.187.en: üåê UNIVERSAL IMPROVEMENTS: Tuya epoch (2000) auto-detection now in HybridSensorBase - benefits ALL 21+ sensor drivers (climate, motion, contact, air quality, etc.). LCD devices automatically get correct time display!

5.5.186.en: üîò BUTTON FIX: Added onOff attribute listener for TS0044 buttons - more reliable button press detection. Button presses now properly trigger flows!

5.5.185.en: üîß FIX #88: _TZE200_e3oitdyu now correctly matches dimmer_dual_channel (was wrongly matching climate_sensor). ‚ú® NEW #91: Added IR Blaster driver (TS1201/ZS06) for IR remote control devices.

5.5.184.en: üïê TIME SYNC FIX: CRITICAL - LCD devices now use TUYA epoch (2000) instead of Unix epoch (1970). Previously time showed year 2055! Now shows correct 2025. Temp/humidity/battery all working. Ref: Z2M#30054

5.5.183.en: üå°Ô∏è CLIMATE FIX: Reverted to v5.5.165 style - TuyaTimeSyncMixin was breaking temp/humidity. Now uses HybridSensorBase directly with inline hourly time sync. Temp/humidity + time sync both working! RE-PAIR required.

5.5.182.en: üîò BUTTON FIX: Added multiStateInput + Tuya DP cluster support for button press detection. üéØ MOTION SENSOR: Removed static temp/humidity capabilities - now added dynamically only if device has those clusters. RE-PAIR required for motion sensors.

5.5.181.en: üêõ FIX CRASH: IASZoneManager waits for Zigbee stack ready before IAS enrollment. Prevents crash on Homey restart.

5.5.180.en: üî• FULL HYBRID + TIME SYNC: Climate sensors use TuyaTimeSyncMixin + HybridSensorBase. Auto time sync every 6h + on wake. Proper DP parsing. LCD clock shows correct time! RE-PAIR required.

5.5.179.en: üî• HYBRID MODE: Climate box _TZE284_vvmbj46n now uses HybridSensorBase for BOTH Tuya DP AND ZCL cluster handling. Receives temp/humidity/battery via DP1/2/4 AND ZCL clusters 0x0402/0x0405/0x0001. Time sync via Tuya DP. User must RE-PAIR device!

5.5.178.en: üêõ FIX: Soil sensor Flow Card IDs corrected (soil_sensor_* prefix). Climate box now properly handles DP data. Fixes 'Invalid Flow Card ID: soil_moisture_below' error.

5.5.177.en: üì¶ Z2M IDs SYNC: Added 20+ manufacturerNames from zigbee-herdsman-converters for TS0043 (3-button), TS0044/TS004F (4-button), and climate box LCD sensors. Better device recognition!

5.5.176.en: üïê TIME SYNC via Tuya DP: Climate box _TZE284_vvmbj46n now syncs time via Tuya DP cluster (0xEF00) since ZCL Time cluster is OUTPUT only. Syncs on init, on data reception, every 24h. Uses Tuya epoch (2000) + Paris timezone.

5.5.175.en: üîß MAPPING FIX: _TZ3000_bczr4e10 (TS0043) moved to button_wireless_3 (3 buttons). _TZ3000_BGTZM4NY removed from switch_1gang (it's a 4-button remote, not a switch!). Based on Zigbee interviews.

5.5.174.en: üî¨ NEW: Dedicated driver for _TZE284_vvmbj46n climate box. ‚ö†Ô∏è Time sync NOT possible (firmware limitation - Time cluster is OUTPUT only). 100% Tuya DP handling, no phantom buttons, proper temp/humidity/battery via DP 1/2/4.

5.5.173.en: üîò BUTTON FIX: button_wireless now uses ButtonDevice base class for full single/double/long press support via Scenes cluster + Tuya 0xFD command. Devices like _TZ3000_bczr4e10, _TZ3000_bgtzm4ny now trigger all press types correctly.

5.5.172.en: üïê TIME SYNC FIX #2: Fixed _respondToTimeRequest() to use Tuya epoch (2000). üéÆ BUTTON FIX: Wireless controllers now use class 'button' instead of 'sensor', removed alarm_generic capability. Devices: _TZ3000_bczr4e10, _TZ3000_bgtzm4ny now correctly detected as scene switches.

5.5.171.en: üïê CRITICAL FIX: Climate sensor time sync now uses Tuya epoch (2000) instead of Unix epoch (1970). LCD displays now show correct date/time. +168 manufacturer IDs from Z2M. Flow cards fixes.

5.5.170.en: üîß FIX: Moved _TZ3000_5bpeda8u from motion_sensor to button_wireless_1 driver. It's a smart button, not a motion sensor.

5.5.167.en: üßπ MAJOR CLEANUP: Removed 10 duplicate flow cards from .homeycompose that were conflicting with driver-specific flows. Cleaner flow selection for contact sensors, water leak, smoke, gas, and tamper triggers.

5.5.166.en: üßπ CLEANUP: Removed duplicate motion_detected flow triggers. Motion sensors now have cleaner flow card selection without duplicates.

5.5.165.en: üêõ FIX SOS Button: Changed from alarm_contact to alarm_generic - removes confusing 'contactalarm' triggers. Now only shows 'SOS Alert' as expected.

5.5.163.en: üßπ SMART CLEANUP: Energy capabilities (measure_power, measure_voltage, measure_current, meter_power) are now automatically removed after 15 minutes if no data is received. Keeps UI clean for devices without energy monitoring.

5.5.143.en: üîå ZCL DEVICE PROFILES: Context-aware IAS Zone (0x0500) mapping. Same cluster now correctly mapped: motion for PIR, contact for door, water for leak, smoke for detector, gas, CO, vibration, SOS. 50+ manufacturerNames supported!

5.5.142.en: üß† DEVICE PROFILES: Context-aware DP mapping by manufacturerName > driverType > universal fallback. Same DP now correctly mapped based on device type (e.g., DP1=motion for PIR, DP1=contact for door sensor, DP106=lux for ZG-204ZM but humidity for siren).
